title: Must be Level 7
body:
In order for me to post a discussion under the community tab I "Must be level 7 or higher to create a discussion".
I'm confused, is level relative to your in-game level? If so I'm a 30...

replies.body: Every once and a while someone's board account doesn't seem to want to sync up correctly for some reason. Posting here in H&S or using the syncing tool up top should do the trick!
